prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a spooky atmosphere and glowing features.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that wields a bone as a weapon, with a spectral aura.
Imagine a Pokemon that haunts caves, with a skeletal appearance and ethereal flames.
Design a medium-sized Pokemon that has a unique blend of gray and teal colors.
Generate a Pokemon with a strong connection to its ancestors, showing a fierce yet playful personality.
Make a ghostly creature that roams the mountains, with a distinctive bone and smoky effects.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the earth, with a focus on stealth and strategy.
